entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
